1101650.name: OutSpaceX_EP1
1101650.description:
In the depths of space, speed is everything.

OutSpaceX is a high-speed space racing game that blends futuristic aesthetics with adrenaline-pumping competition. Take control of advanced anti-gravity vehicles equipped with particle thrusters and race through treacherous interstellar tracks filled with sharp turns, cosmic hazards, and breathtaking visuals.

Whether you’re drifting along asteroid fields, navigating high-temperature orbits near stars, or soaring through zero-gravity zones, each course offers a unique blend of challenge and spectacle. Dynamic track events, environmental anomalies, and cosmic landscapes ensure that no two races ever feel the same.

Race against AI pilots from across the galaxy in a thrilling solo experience, or compete online in multiplayer matches to prove you’re the fastest in the universe.

In-game:

  • [W] Throttle

  • [A] Brake

  • [S][D] Turn Left / Right

  • [Space] Nitro Boost

Menu:

  • [Enter] Confirm

  • [A] Cancel

categories.description: 无需应对快速反应事件
